I like convore, I think it has some great features, but it does need to update something's and start communicating more, e.g. blogging about what's happening, what they are working on. Just to get the interest and involvement of a community increasing again.

it's a bummer that convore didn't continue on the trajectory it was on. still, I have high hopes for it. :)
